attributes.action: Force Food Companies to stop giving us less for our money
attributes.additional_details:
You keep saying you want to help 'real people'. Well a good start would be to stop food companies from cutting down the size of their products and giving us less for our money.

Cutting one biscuit here and there or "rebranding" & knocking off 10g of museli.

How is it so difficult for you people to understand that businesses cannot grow for ever and likewise with food products - companies won't be able to keep cutting the sizes down forever.

The government needs to act NOW and introduce legislation put legal minimum limits on all food / drink sold in the UK.
